page.title: 10Industry
page.content: My Dad's factory makes tools for other factories, like the helicopter factory. It also makes other metal things like buckles for the shoe factory. They have a lot of machines and nearly every year they buy a new machine. It is a very good factory and it was built in 1963. There is a new computer to help in the work. They get a lot of jobs in, some big jobs and some small. Sometimes it is hard to get to the end of the factory because it is so crowded. The factory people work from 8 o'clock in the morning to 5 o'clock when we have our tea. There is always a lot of mess and a man comes to sweep up in the mornings. Mostly Grandad does the deliveries, but sometimes my Mum or my Nan help.
